Rescue the Druid Halsin Walkthrough

Rescue the Druid Halsin is a subquest for Find a Cure.

The entrance to the Goblin Camp can be found going through the Blighted Village, through the forest and over the wooden bridge (X:-63 Y:365) Once you reach the camp, go through the courtyard and go through the Heavy Oak Doors (X:-106 Y:454). You are now in shattered Sanctum, go towards the end and take the stairs on the upper right corner of the room. Head up the stairs and turn left and follow
